p: Early reports, mainly from China, suggested that over 60% of severely ill COVID-19 patients presented with additional organ dysfunction syndromes ( 119). This has been, at least in part, related to a sepsis-like syndrome induced by high levels of circulating cytokines. Cytokine storm may be induced by a superimposed septic syndrome or by the direct effect of the virus on the infected host ( 119). It has been suggested that anti-inflammatory drugs may ameliorate COVID-19 infections.
